title: 98.  Abandonment, Re-parenting, & Relationships
description:
Hey sis!

This week we are talking all about the importance of re-parenting and the role it plays in abandonment wounds/trauma. If you struggle with handling break-ups/ghosting/people leaving without notice, you'll WANT to hear this.

Make sure to register for Nothing Was the Same Week here, a week of *free* live events (hosted by me!) designed to help you. Reclaim. Who. TF. You. Are.

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
